# BR_Data Submission PR

Thank you for contributing match data. Please complete the checklist.

## Submission Metadata
- Event name/date: <!-- e.g., 2025-12-02, Week 3 -->
- Teams involved: <!-- e.g., Team A vs Team B -->
- Source/recording: <!-- link or short note -->
- Contact (GitHub handle): <!-- @yourname -->

## Files Included
List the files and target paths under `apps/analyzer/BR_Data/...`.

- [ ] `apps/analyzer/BR_Data/<top-level>/<subfolder>/BattleResult_1.json`
- [ ] `apps/analyzer/BR_Data/<top-level>/<subfolder>/BattleResult_2.json`

## Checklist
- [ ] Files are JSON, within size limits (<10 MB each)
- [ ] Filenames follow `BattleResult_<n>.json` or established convention
- [ ] Data aligns with analyzer schema/version
- [ ] No personal or sensitive information included
